flawed_nl_solution:
After Smith gave him $200, Randy had 3000+200=<<3000+200=2300>>2300 dollars.
The value of the rest of the money is 2300-1200=<<2300-1200=1100>>1100 dollars.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3200, not 2300. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
